sen.j: 777年（宝亀8年）遣唐使判官として入唐、翌778年（宝亀9年）肥後国天草郡に漂着し帰朝した。
sen.e: In 777, he reached Tang as Kentoshi-jo (Third Officer of the Envoy to Tang China), and in 778 he returned to Japan, drifted to Amakusa County, Higo Province.

sen.e: In 785, he was arrested and executed as a mastermind of the assassination of FUJIWARA no Tanetsugu which occurred in Nagaoka-kyo (the ancient capital of Nagaoka) during Emperor Kanmu's visit.
